title: Do I remember that Fergies Ark \received\" a purple heart for being \"hit\" by the battleship -- or was it just a gimmick by the owner of the restaurant to put the purple on the Ark?"
text:
Ben Steelman says he hadn't heard about the purple heart during his
research for his story about the 50th anniversary of the battleship's
arrival. Here's a link to the story, which describes events around
the collision:
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20111001/ARTICLES/111009989?p=all&tc=pgall
